title: Chapter 1407 - Pulling In The Net
body:
Chapter 1407 - Pulling In The Net

The mountain collapsed, and the skies shook.

Su Yi stood in the sky, holding Qing Tang protectively behind him.

His eyes flashed like lightning as he immediately locked onto his opponent, a man shrouded in black robes. He had a strange aura, and a mottled and inscrutable aura of calamity poured down around him. He gripped a beast-bone longbow.

The moment Su Yi looked over, the man in black shot his already-strung bow.

Boom!

It went off like a thunderclap, reverberating throughout heaven and earth. A golden arrow brought with it dazzling immortal light as it tore through the skies and descended, its power shaking everything on all sides.

Su Yi didn’t clash with it head-on. Instead, he pulled Qing Tang out of the way. The arrow missed them and exploded in midair. Firelight swept outward.

“Hold on tight.” Su Yi put Qing Tang on his back, drew...
